General.Name: Soechi Lines Tbk
General.Description: PT Soechi Lines Tbk provides shipping and marine transportation services in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Shipping and Shipyard. It charters vessels to the oil and gas, and chemical companies. In addition, the company offers shipbuilding, dry docking, ship repair, and maintenance services. Further, the company provides management and business consulting services; and business brokerage services. It owns and operates a fleet of 37 vessels. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Soechi Lines Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Soechi Group.
General.Address: Sahid Sudirman Building, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10220
